question:
Which among the following about the Eka movement are correct?
1. It was started in 1921
2. Madari Pasi was the the organizer of the movement
3. Excessive taxation was the main cause of the movement
4. The movement took place in present Uttar Pradesh
Choose the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Eka movement was started in 1921 in present Uttarpradesh under the leadership of Madari Pasi and with the help of other low caste leaders. Excessive taxation was the main cause of the movement. In the year 1922 (March) the movement was suppressed by the British.
